Account Setup with Altilia Intelligent Automation™

07 Jun 2022 - 1 minute to read

Ask for your credentials

Send an e-mail to Altilia Service Team asking about the access, we will provide you the link and the credentials to log in our platform.

Login

    1. After requesting your credentials, use the link provided to access the Altilia Intelligent Automation™ login page:
    1. Type the username and temporary password provided and click “Login”:
    1. Update your password by confirming it twice if it’s the first access in our platform. Then click on “Update” to be redirected to the home page:
    1. You are now in! The following image shows the Home Page of the platform where you can create your projects as described in chapter Creating and Managing Projects. You can see your username at the top right of the screen.

Logout

From the Home Page or any other Artifacts you can log out for the platform by clicking on your account icon at top right of the screen and then on “Logout” to be redirect to the login page:

Dark Mode

From the Home Page or any other Artifacts, switch in dark mode by clicking on your account icon at top right of the screen and then on “Dark mode”:

Recover Password

If you have lost your password, please follow these steps to recover your Altilia account and continue to use our services
    1. In the Altilia Intelligent Automation™ login page click on “Recover Password”:
    1. Enter your e-mail or username and click on “Send via Email” in order to receive the instruction to reset your password.
    1. In the content of the e-mail you received, click “Reset Password”:
    1. You are redirected to the password update page, enter your new password twice and click “Update” to be redirected to the home page.
